text:
🌾 Exciting update! ICAR has released new guidelines for B.Sc Agriculture admissions 2025. 📚 Stay prepared, future agri professionals! 🚜

This notice includes important changes to eligibility, updated credit system, and new course structures for B.Sc Agri programs. Students are advised to review all details carefully before applying.

The syllabus now emphasizes on agri-tech, climate-smart agriculture 🌱 and entrepreneurship. Make sure to download the official document and prepare your documents accordingly.

More updates will follow soon! 🎓

👩‍🌾 Krishi Vigyan Kendra has announced a new training program on sustainable tomato farming! 🍅 Learn modern cultivation, pest control, water-efficient systems, and marketing strategies. The training also covers modern hydroponics techniques.

Apply soon — limited seats available. 🧑‍🌾

🚀 Agri Expo 2025 is coming this December! 🤝 Join to explore innovations, connect with companies, and meet agri scientists from across India.

Workshops, live demos, and product launches await! 🌱

📘 New notes uploaded: ‘Soil Science — Unit 3’. This includes key concepts like soil texture, structure, and fertility management. 🌍 Perfect for 3rd semester students preparing for mid-term exams.

The unit also contains solved numericals and previous-year questions for better understanding.
